overview: WHEN THE LIGHT GOES OUT, the short film that portrays the dramas lived over almost 20 years of history, totally based on real facts, a story of dreams, and realities, which is confused with the history of most Brazilian artists, WHEN THE LIGHT GOES OUT, tells the story of a subversive boy, and far ahead of his time, who with his artist's soul, fought against all the prejudices imposed by a society in the middle of the 90's. At the age of 6, he was referred to a psychologist, for affirming with complete conviction that one day he would go to the program of Hebe Camargo, victim of prejudice since always, he was almost expelled from school because he liked to dance and imitate the artists of his childhood, years later at the same school he becomes an imitator of Queen of the little ones: Xuxa; and star status, by becoming a phenomenon on the internet, and the dream of being a presenter.  This film will not be shown on the internet.
title: When the Light Goes Out
